name: BlackJack by FAB
description:
A simple BlackJack game made with Python! Pick 3 different kinds of dealers and play with luck and strategy!

Credits to my other colleagues who were able to make this small project happen.

Pixel Julian Fabian - Game Design; Dealer Pix

Jaro Alexander Aguilar - Game Design and Assets; Dealer Jaro

Joseph Charles Balisalisa - Me, Main Programmer, and Developer; Dealer Chuck
